You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesY Y] > &yuml

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&Yuml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0178/index.htm U+00178].
  * `&yuml;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ff/index.htm U+000FF].
  * `&yuml` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/00ff/index.htm U+000FF].
